content: i love roses and i love hearts so began my quest for a rosy heart weariness from searching for such a pattern the help of christina s swirly rose 1 and structural practice from some of the first crocheted hearts i made like amelia s heart bookmark 2 june s love hearts 3 and lucy s teeny tiny hearts 4 led to my wish coming true finally a rosy heart rosy heart applique for a heart measuring ~ 2 50 inches by 2 00 inches use worsted yarn and a 3 75mm hook for a heart measuring ~ 2 00 inches by 1 75 inches use dk yarn and a 3 75mm hook for a heart measuring ~ 1 5 inches by 1 75 inches use fingering sock yarn and 3 50mm hook for a heart measuring ~ 1 25 inches by 1 5 inches use a double strand of a lace weight yarn and a 3 00mm hook 1 http //lovestitchlove blogspot com/2011/10/swirly-rose-free-pattern html 2 http //www crochetville com/community/topic/88245-overlapping-hearts-bookmark-pattern/ 3 http //www planetjune com/blog/free-crochet-patterns/love-hearts/ 4 http //attic24 typepad com/weblog/teeny-tiny-hearts html
